channel.description: Recent content in Dramas on Rumor Theory

item.title: The Simpsons season 4 episode 21 : Predict the Coronavirus?
item.description: Did the Simpsons predict Coronavirus? Did the Simpsons Predict the Coronavirus? First predicting President Trump and now this?! See the receipts here! Everyone is talking about the Coronavirus these last few weeks…but were the Simpsons were talking about it 27 years ago?

item.title: Altered Carbon Season 1 Recap / Review
item.description: One of the most intriguing sci-fi dramas of recent years is Netflix’s ‘Altered Carbon’. Based on Richard Morgan’s book of the same name, it is set in a futuristic world where humans have found a way to cheat death.
